name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John Warren YERGER, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., note their dissent.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John Warren YERGER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
FLAHERTY and ZAPPALA, JJ., note their dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Barry M. Miller, Hazleton, for appellant.
Mary M. Killinger, Chief, Appeals Div. Fort Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
544 A.2d 446
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. John Warren YERGER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1988.
Decided July 27, 1988.
Barry M. Miller, Hazleton, for appellant.
Mary M. Killinger, Chief, Appeals Div. Fort Washington, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, JJ.
